channel.title: Can someone help me fix my server to get online etc...? please read more
channel.description: i need help gettig my client online could anyone here please just teamviewer with me to help me get it online quickly? please and thank you i been at this for 5 days now and i still havent been able to get it online please someone help me..

item.title: Can someone help me fix my server to get online etc...? please read more
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

  1. Do ipconfig in a cmd window
  2. get the localhost ip normally something like 192.168.0.1
  3. double check your LAN ip by typing in your localhost in your web browser and going to the status page on your router.
  4. use the LAN ip and the port 43594 to portforward in the router browser.
  5. Port your firewall.
  6. set the LAN ip into your client.

you should now be ported.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me fix my server to get online etc...? please read more
